titles.title: Rail Crossings Safety Improvement Act
To amend the authorization in title 49, United States Code, for capital grants for rail line relocation projects.
Rail Crossings Safety Improvement Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary:
Rail Crossings Safety Improvement Act
This bill reauthorizes appropriations to the Secretary of Transportation for FY2016-FY2019, at levels reduced from those for FY2006-FY2009, for capital grants to states for rail line relocation and improvement projects.
